trans-unit.source: Represents one, and only one, of three possible properties of a print queue: <see cref="P:System.Printing.PrintQueue.Location" />, <see cref="P:System.Printing.PrintQueue.Comment" />, or <see cref="P:System.Printing.PrintQueue.ShareName" />.
trans-unit.target: 代表下列三種可能的列印佇列屬性的其中一種 (而且只有一種)：<see cref="P:System.Printing.PrintQueue.Location" />、<see cref="P:System.Printing.PrintQueue.Comment" /> 或 <see cref="P:System.Printing.PrintQueue.ShareName" />。

trans-unit.source: An object of this class is primarily used as a parameter for one of the overloaded <xref:System.Printing.PrintServer.InstallPrintQueue%2A> methods of a <xref:System.Printing.PrintServer>.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別的物件主要用做為參數的其中一個多載<xref:System.Printing.PrintServer.InstallPrintQueue%2A>方法<xref:System.Printing.PrintServer>。

trans-unit.source: This method makes it possible to install a print queue while initializing only one of its three major <xref:System.String> properties.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會讓您能夠初始化其三個主要的其中之一時安裝列印佇列<xref:System.String>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Having three separate overloads of the method is not possible because they would have the same signature and no two overloads of a method can have the same signature.
trans-unit.target: 有三個不同的方法多載不可能因為它們會具有相同的簽章，而且兩個多載的方法可以有相同的簽章。

trans-unit.source: If you want to install a print queue and initialize two or more of its major string properties, there is another overload, <xref:System.Printing.PrintServer.InstallPrintQueue%2A>, that substitutes three <xref:System.String> parameters for the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueueStringProperty> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要安裝列印佇列，並初始化兩個或多個主要的字串屬性，則另一個多載， <xref:System.Printing.PrintServer.InstallPrintQueue%2A>，三個替代，<xref:System.String>參數<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueueStringProperty>參數。

trans-unit.source: These parameters are used to set the major String properties in this order: <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.ShareName%2A>, <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.Comment%2A>, and <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.Location%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這些參數用來設定主要的字串屬性，依此順序： <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.ShareName%2A>， <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.Comment%2A>，和<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.Location%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Use an empty string for a parameter that corresponds to a property you do not want to initialize.
trans-unit.target: 對應至屬性，您不想要初始化的參數使用空字串。

trans-unit.source: Classes within the <xref:System.Printing> namespace are not supported for use within a Windows service or ASP.NET application or service.
trans-unit.target: 類別內<xref:System.Printing>命名空間不支援為 Windows 服務或 ASP.NET 應用程式或服務中使用。

trans-unit.source: Attempting to use these classes from within one of these application types may produce unexpected problems, such as diminished service performance and run-time exceptions.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試使用這些類別時，這些應用程式類型的其中一個內可能會產生無法預期的問題，例如會受到影響服務的效能和執行階段例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If you want to print from a Windows Forms application, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> namespace.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要從 Windows Form 應用程式列印，請參閱<xref:System.Drawing.Printing>命名空間。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintQueueStringProperty" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintQueueStringProperty" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the print queue property that is represented.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定代表的列印佇列屬性值。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> with the value of the property.

For example, if the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueueStringProperty.Type%2A> is <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueueStringPropertyType.Location>, the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueueStringProperty.Name%2A> might be "Department Supply Room"; but if the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueueStringProperty.Type%2A> is <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueueStringPropertyType.Comment>, the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueueStringProperty.Name%2A> might be "Use only A4 size paper with this printer."
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueueStringProperty.Type%2A>是<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueueStringPropertyType.Location>、<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueueStringProperty.Name%2A>可能 」 部門提供的空間 」; 但是，如果<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueueStringProperty.Type%2A>是<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueueStringPropertyType.Comment>、<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueueStringProperty.Name%2A>可能是 「 使用只有 A4 大小紙張與這台印表機。 」

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that identifies which of the three possible properties of a print queue is being represented.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值會從三個列印佇列屬性中識別出哪一個是代表的屬性。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintQueueStringPropertyType" /> that specifies the kind of print queue property that is being represented.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintQueueStringPropertyType" />，指定所表示之列印佇列屬性的類型

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Printing.PrintServer.InstallPrintQueue%2A> method of a <xref:System.Printing.PrintServer> uses this information to ensure that the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueueStringProperty.Name%2A> value is assigned to the correct property of the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> being installed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Printing.PrintServer.InstallPrintQueue%2A>方法<xref:System.Printing.PrintServer>使用此資訊來確保<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueueStringProperty.Name%2A>值指派給正確的屬性的<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>正在安裝。
